mapper.select: SELECT count(*) as cnt FROM meeting WHERE crewNo = #{crewNo} AND meetingStatus = 1
SELECT count(*) as cnt FROM meeting WHERE meetingDate BETWEEN concat( #{date}, ' 00:00:00' ) AND concat( #{date}, ' 23:59:59' ) AND meetingStatus = 1

SELECT meetingNo, crewNo, memberNo, meetingName, meetingDate, meetingLoc, meetingPrice, meetingMax, meetingAttend, meetingStatus, meetingOriginalImg, meetingSaveImg, createdAt FROM meeting WHERE crewNo = #{crewNo} AND meetingDate > CURRENT_DATE() AND meetingStatus = 1 ORDER BY meetingDate

SELECT meetingNo, crewNo, memberNo, meetingName, meetingDate, meetingLoc, meetingPrice, meetingMax, meetingAttend, meetingStatus, meetingOriginalImg, meetingSaveImg, createdAt FROM meeting WHERE meetingDate BETWEEN concat( #{date}, ' 00:00:00' ) AND concat( #{date}, ' 23:59:59' ) AND meetingStatus = 1 ORDER BY meetingNo LIMIT #{recordPerPage} OFFSET #{startNo};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO meeting (crewNo, memberNo, meetingName, meetingDate, meetingLoc, meetingPrice, meetingMax, meetingOriginalImg, meetingSaveImg) VALUES (#{crewNo}, #{memberNo}, #{meetingName}, #{meetingDate}, #{meetingLoc}, #{meetingPrice}, #{meetingMax}, #{meetingOriginalImg}, #{meetingSaveImg})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM meeting_member WHERE memberNo = #{memberNo} AND meetingNo = #{meetingNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE meeting SET meetingAttend = meetingAttend - 1 WHERE meetingNo IN ( SELECT t.meetingNo FROM ( SELECT m.meetingNo FROM meeting_member mm INNER JOIN meeting m ON m.meetingNo = mm.meetingNo WHERE m.crewNo = #{crewNo} AND mm.memberNo = #{memberNo} ) t );
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM meeting_member WHERE meetingMemberNo IN ( SELECT t.meetingMemberNo FROM ( SELECT mm.meetingMemberNo FROM meeting_member mm INNER JOIN meeting m ON m.meetingNo = mm.meetingNo WHERE m.crewNo = #{crewNo} AND mm.memberNo = #{memberNo} ) t );
